alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Tyler and northeastern Jasper Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Town Bluff, while another developing storm was noted behind it near Roganville. Each storm moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Town Bluff and Roganville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
